About Me

Greetings! I am an aspiring web developer with in an interest in productivity and social media website applications. I have been coding since the end of 2021. Please ask me any questions or offer any suggestions for any projects, thank you!

Work

10000 Days

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Node

This site is an invitation for several important people in my life to come celebrate with me on my 10000th day of life. I will be hosting a get together at one of my favorite bars in NYC and have created this site for invited guests to learn more about the event, RSVP, and communicate with other attendes.

View Project on GitHub

Taskinator Pro

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap

An intuitive organizer application for creating tasks with a description and due date. The user can also categorize the task as 'In Progress', 'To Do', 'In Review', or 'Done' or delete the task by simply dragging the task box to the appropriate location. This all done using the power of JQuery.

View Project on GitHub

Weather Dashboard

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

Search the weather conditions, including a 5 day forecast, humidity, wind speed, and UV index of your favorite cities using several weather APIs installed in this application.

View Project on GitHub
